title: Notice how the plat guy gets over 20 downvotes when he points out the obvious on this G&B thread

embed.description: So according to Riot on the Patch notes: > Simply put, the jungle's a tad easier and gives more gold, but nets less overall experience unless you've got a jungle item to make up the difference.

body: Hopefully Riot Game doesn't actually listen to what G&B has to say...
